rooms.description: Main entrance with foyer area including coat closet and shoe rack.
Open-plan living and dining space integrated with the kitchen for a modern Chettinad style.
Functional open-plan kitchen with ample counter space, storage, and ventilation as per Vastu principles.
Designated workspace area that can double as a home office, positioned to promote focus.
